integration_removed.title: The SunWEG integration has been removed
integration_removed.description:
The SunWEG integration has been removed from Home Assistant.

The library that Home Assistant uses to connect with their services, [don't work anymore as expected, demanding daily token renew]({issue}).

To resolve this issue, please remove the (now defunct) integration entries from your Home Assistant setup. [Click here to see your existing SunWEG integration entries]({entries}).
